TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlWindow extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示邏輯視窗，包含 的一個或多個執行個體。

span.span: Represents the logical window that contains one or more instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不應與在 Windows Form 或 Win32 API 中，視窗的概念混淆沒有任何`HWND`或類似直接對應到的執行個體的 Windows 資源。 should not be confused with the concept of a window in Windows Forms or the Win32 API; there is no `HWND` or similar Windows resource that corresponds directly to an instance of . 相反地，上使用者的畫面上，以及與透過提示和對話方塊的使用者互動的方法中提供的文件的位置的高層級描述。Rather, provides high-level descriptions of a document's location on a user's screen, as well as methods for interacting with users by way of prompts and dialog boxes. 做為 Web 頁面的文件和它的中繼資料，例如文件的位置和網頁瀏覽器功能的邏輯容器。 acts as a logical container for a Web page's documents and its metadata, such as the document's location and the capabilities of the Web browser. Web 網頁所組成的單一文件，或是`FRAMESET`包含一或多個`FRAME`項目，其中每個裝載自己的文件。A Web page consists of a single document, or a `FRAMESET` containing one or more `FRAME` elements, each of which hosts its own document. Web 開發人員會使用框架，顯示邏輯相關的頁面並排顯示 （例如，瀏覽網頁旁的內容頁面）。Web developers use framesets to show logically related pages side by side (for example, a content page next to a navigation page). 當頁面包含一份文件時，您可以存取透過的屬性; 如果頁面會使用畫面格，您也可以存取透過其文件集合，其中包含一或多個物件。When a page consists of a single document, you can access it through the property of ; if the page uses frames, you can access their documents through the collection, which consists of one or more objects. 時您的主機控制項中的 Windows Forms 應用程式中，您可以選擇與使用標準的 Windows Form 類別，例如使用者互動或，或者您可以使用方法上定義針對此目的。When your host the control in a Windows Forms application, you can choose to interact with the user using standard Windows Forms classes, such as or , or you can use methods on defined for this purpose. 方法會提供自訂文字中的簡單的對話方塊和**確定**按鈕;企業自訂文字和文字輸入的欄位會向使用者呈現; 和 對話方塊中提供自訂的文字行並**確定**並**取消**按鈕。The method presents a simple dialog box with custom text and an **OK** button; presents a line of custom text and a text input field to the user; and presents a dialog box with a line of custom text and **OK** and **Cancel** buttons. 您可以使用開啟新視窗，其中包含新的文件。You can use to open new windows containing new documents. 指定的 URL 載入具名視窗中，如果不存在，請建立它，而一律在新建立的視窗中開啟它的 URL。 loads the specified URL into the named window, creating it if it does not already exist, while always opens its URL in a newly created window. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含兩個方法。The following code example contains two methods. 第一個名為的視窗中開啟 URL `displayWindow`，則會建立與顯示狀態列。The first opens a URL in a window named `displayWindow`, which it creates with a status bar displayed. 第二個在相同的視窗中，開啟另一個 URL，但指定應該顯示只有位置列。The second opens another URL in the same window, but specifies that only the location bar should be displayed. 請注意視窗和控制項所顯示的維度取決所在 URL 第一次開啟。Notice that the dimensions of the window and the controls that are displayed depends on which URL is opened first. 程式碼範例需要您的表單包含控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your form contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供更強大的版本方法。The class offers a more powerful version of the method. 雖然接受 Unicode 文字做為輸入，Internet Explorer 指令碼提示將不會顯示非拉丁語言文字適當地在 Windows 95、 Windows 98、 Windows ME 或 Windows NT 由於作業系統限制。Although accepts Unicode text as input, the Internet Explorer script prompt will not display non-Latin language text appropriately on Windows 95, Windows 98, Windows ME or Windows NT due to operating system limitations. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [INFO: Internet Explorer 指令碼會提示和 MBCS/Unicode](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;211147)。For more information, see [INFO: Internet Explorer Script Prompts and MBCS/Unicode](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;211147).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否視窗已關閉。Use the property to determine if the window is already closed. 如果視窗已關閉，則這個方法會有任何作用。If the window is already closed, this method will have no effect. 當您建立新的 windows，使用或是，導致 HTML 文件物件模型，以開啟 Internet Explorer 的新執行個體。When you create new windows using or , causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果您不能呼叫所有您已建立的 windows 上的 Internet Explorer 的這個執行個體將會繼續執行您的應用程式關閉時，即使。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application closes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟視窗，並關閉它，如果使用者已無法使用它在過去 5 分鐘內。The following code example opens a window, and closes it if the user has not used it in the past five minutes. 撰寫程式碼範例假設您的表單具有控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`，則名為`Button1`，和類別名為`Timer1`。The code example was written under the assumption that your form has a control named `WebBrowser1`, a named `Button1`, and a class named `Timer1`. 若要成功執行此範例中，將變更提供給第一個引數至有效的 URL。To run this example successfully, change the first argument supplied to to a valid URL. summary.span: 在視窗內執行的指令碼遇到執行階段錯誤時發生。

span.span: Occurs when script running inside of the window encounters a run-time error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 頁面可以包含指令碼撰寫的程式碼，通常在 JScript 或 VBScript，載入頁面時執行。HTML pages can contain script code, usually written in JScript or VBScript, that executes when a page is loaded. 每當指令碼遇到執行階段錯誤，就會發生。 occurs whenever a script encounters a run-time error. 因為指令碼是晚期繫結，表示對物件的呼叫，並解決執行階段錯誤時，可從參考 null 物件來呼叫未定義的屬性或方法的所有項目。Because script code is late-bound, which means that calls against the object are not resolved until run-time, errors can include everything from referencing a null object to calling an undefined property or method. 您可以設定屬性為 true，以便防止 Internet Explorer 中的 [原生錯誤] 對話方塊中顯示。You can set the property of to true in order to prevent the native error dialog box in Internet Explorer from displaying. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設陷錯誤的結果時的 HTML 網頁上的指令碼嘗試存取文件中未定義的物件。The following code example traps the error that results when a script on an HTML page attempts to access an object that is not defined in the document. 必須完全載入之前附加事件處理常式，否則將無法運作的範例。The page must be fully loaded before the event handler is attached, otherwise the example will not work. remarks.format: ## Remarks A`FRAME`是一份定義內的 windows `FRAMESET`。A `FRAME` is a set of windows defined within a `FRAMESET`. `FRAME`可讓裝載單一文件中的多個文件。`FRAME`s enable hosting multiple documents within a single document. 每個`FRAME`定義為具有特定資料列和資料行寬度，而且與其他頁面上的位置`FRAME`內定義的 s `FRAMESET`; 位置`FRAME`固定的雖然使用者可能有時會使用滑鼠資料指標來擴大或縮小`FRAME`。Each `FRAME` is defined as possessing a certain row and column width, and is position on the page in relation to the other `FRAME`s defined within the `FRAMESET`; the position of a `FRAME` is fixed, although a user may sometimes use the mouse cursor to grow or shrink the `FRAME`. `IFRAME`類似於在範圍內，但它需要不會錨定在固定位置。An `IFRAME` is similar to a frame, but it need not be anchored in a fixed position. 畫面格會包含一個執行個體針對每個`FRAME`或`IFRAME`網頁中定義。Frames will contain one instance of for each `FRAME` or `IFRAME` defined within a Web page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查每份文件內包含框架的網頁，並從每個頁面供未來檢查建立的所有外寄的超連結的資料表。The following code example inspects each document within a page containing frames and creates a table of all of the outgoing hyperlinks from each page for future inspection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件運作方式類似上的事件控制： 它會通知會安全地存取 HTML 文件內的項目。The event works similarly to the event on the control: it signals that it is safe to access HTML elements inside of the document. 您無法取消的預設動作事件。You cannot cancel the default action for the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法使用来移動的視窗顯示螢幕的邊緣上; 這個方法也會提供透過網頁上的指令碼，允許不受信任的指令碼，以呈現不可見的視窗不會視為安全。You cannot use to move a window off of the visible edge of the screen; this method is also available through script on a Web page, and allowing untrusted script to render windows invisible is not considered secure. 將會引發如果您嘗試移動的視窗和它的父視窗具有不同的最上層網域。 will raise an if the window you are trying to move and its parent window have different top-level domains. 例如，如果您要裝載控制指向 a.adatum.com，建立新的視窗使用顯示 b.adatum.com。For example, if you are hosting the control pointing to a.adatum.com, create a new window using to display b.adatum.com. 在此情況下，這兩個視窗會被視為相同的最上層網域的一部分，並不會擲回例外狀況。In this case, both windows are considered to be part of the same top-level domain, and the exception is not thrown. 不過，如果您呼叫若要顯示 www,microsoft.com，兩個視窗現在有不同的最上層網域，而作業將會導致擲回的例外狀況。However, if you call to display www,microsoft.com, the two windows now have different top-level domains, and the operation will cause the exception to throw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`url`參數所指向的 HTML 網頁，將摧毀並取代為新的頁面目前顯示在視窗中的頁面; 您的應用程式會保留舊的頁面中受管理的 DOM 物件的任何參考都是無效。If the `url` parameter points to an HTML page, the page currently displayed in the window will be destroyed and replaced with the new page; any references your application holds to managed DOM objects in the old page will not be valid. 如果`url`Internet Explorer 無法顯示資源的點，使用者會看到對話方塊，詢問是否要開啟應用程式，將它儲存至磁碟，或取消下載作業之外的資源。If `url` points to a resource that cannot be displayed by Internet Explorer, the user will be presented with a dialog box asking whether to open the resource outside of the application, save it to disk, or cancel the download operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `target`參數可以建立成由先前呼叫的結果視窗的名稱。The `target` parameter can name a window that was created as the result of a previous call to . 參數可能也會指向按一下超連結所開啟的視窗 (`A`項目) 或`FORM`使用的項目`TARGET`屬性，以在新視窗中開啟它的 URL。The parameter may also point to a window opened by clicking on a hyperlink (`A` element) or a `FORM` element that uses the `TARGET` attribute to open its URL in a new window. 下列 HTML 程式碼會開啟新視窗，名為`orderWindow`當使用者按一下它：The following HTML code will open a new window named `orderWindow` when the user clicks it: `Click to Start Order` 如果您提供的任何選項`windowOptions`參數，不包含任何選項會自動停用。If you supply any options for the `windowOptions` parameter, any option not included is automatically disabled. 換句話說，如果您只指定藉由`windowOptions`您想要的狀態 列，則不顯示功能表列、 工具列、 標題、 捲軸等等除非您明確地啟用它們藉由`windowOptions`。In other words, if you only specify by way of `windowOptions` that you want a status bar, then the menu bar, toolbar, title, scroll bars, and so on will not be displayed unless you explicitly enable them by way of `windowOptions`. 如果所參考的檔案`url`是 HTML 檔案、 文字檔或其他可以裝載在 Internet Explorer 內的檔案類型將會顯示在具名視窗中。If the file referenced by `url` is an HTML file, text file, or other file type that can be hosted inside of Internet Explorer, it will be displayed in the named window. 如果檔案不會顯示在 Internet Explorer 內，而且名為目標的視窗不存在，則視窗隨即開啟只有長到足以讓 Internet Explorer 才能下載資源它會立即關閉之後。If the file cannot be displayed inside of Internet Explorer, and the window named by target does not already exist, then the window will open only long enough for Internet Explorer to download the resource; it will close immediately afterwards. 當您建立新的 windows，使用或，它會導致 HTML 文件物件模型，以開啟 Internet Explorer 的新執行個體。When you create new windows using or , it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果您不能呼叫所有您已建立的 windows 上的 Internet Explorer 的這個執行個體將會繼續執行已結束您的應用程式時，即使。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit. 如果您使用載入 URL，以在現有的視窗中，`windowOptions`將會被忽略; 維度、 外觀及第一次的初始呼叫中指定它的螢幕位置，視窗將會保留。If you use to load a URL in an existing window, `windowOptions` will be ignored; the window will retain the dimensions, appearance, and screen location first given it by the initial call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `target`參數可以建立成由先前呼叫的結果視窗的名稱。The `target` parameter can name a window that was created as the result of a previous call to . 參數可能也會指向按一下超連結所開啟的視窗 (`A`項目) 或`FORM`使用的項目`TARGET`屬性，以在新視窗中開啟它的 URL。The parameter may also point to a window opened by clicking on a hyperlink (`A` element) or a `FORM` element that uses the `TARGET` attribute to open its URL in a new window. 下列 HTML 程式碼會開啟新視窗，名為`orderWindow`當使用者按一下它：The following HTML code will open a new window named `orderWindow` when the user clicks it: `Click to Start Order` 如果您提供的任何選項`windowOptions`參數，不包含任何選項會自動停用。If you supply any options for the `windowOptions` parameter, any option not included is automatically disabled. 換句話說，如果您只指定藉由`windowOptions`您想要的狀態 列，則不顯示功能表列、 工具列、 標題、 捲軸等等除非您明確地啟用它們藉由`windowOptions`。In other words, if you only specify by way of `windowOptions` that you want a status bar, then the menu bar, toolbar, title, scroll bars, and so on will not be displayed unless you explicitly enable them by way of `windowOptions`. 如果所參考的檔案`url`是 HTML 檔案、 文字檔或其他可以裝載在 Internet Explorer 內的檔案類型將會顯示在具名視窗中。If the file referenced by `url` is an HTML file, text file, or other file type that can be hosted inside of Internet Explorer, it will be displayed in the named window. 如果檔案不會顯示在 Internet Explorer 內，而且名為目標的視窗不存在，則視窗隨即開啟只有長到足以讓 Internet Explorer 才能下載資源它會立即關閉之後。If the file cannot be displayed inside of Internet Explorer, and the window named by target does not already exist, then the window will open only long enough for Internet Explorer to download the resource; it will close immediately afterwards. 當您建立新的 windows，使用或，它會導致 HTML 文件物件模型，以開啟 Internet Explorer 的新執行個體。When you create new windows using or , it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果您不能呼叫所有您已建立的 windows 上的 Internet Explorer 的這個執行個體將會繼續執行已結束您的應用程式時，即使。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit. 如果您使用載入 URL，以在現有的視窗中，`windowOptions`將會被忽略; 維度、 外觀及第一次的初始呼叫中指定它的螢幕位置，視窗將會保留。If you use to load a URL in an existing window, `windowOptions` will be ignored; the window will retain the dimensions, appearance, and screen location first given it by the initial call to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含兩個方法：The following code example contains two methods: - 第一個名為的視窗中開啟 URL `displayWindow`，則會建立與顯示狀態列。The first opens a URL in a window named `displayWindow`, which it creates with a status bar displayed. - 第二個在相同的視窗中，開啟另一個 URL，但指定應該顯示只有位置列。The second opens another URL in the same window, but specifies that only the location bar should be displayed. 請注意視窗和控制項所顯示的維度取決所在 URL 第一次開啟。Notice that the dimensions of the window and the controls that are displayed depends on which URL is opened first. 程式碼範例需要您的表單包含控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your form contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 會導致文件，讓文件上的指定的座標位在文件視窗的左上角捲動。 will cause the document to scroll so that the specified coordinate on the document is located in the upper-left corner of the document's window. 如果文件不是長或太寬的這種情形，盡可能指定方向中的文件會捲動。If the document is not long or wide enough for this to happen, will scroll through the document as far as possible in the specified direction. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是由使用者所按的座標位置的文件捲動。The following code example scrolls through the document to the coordinate position clicked by the user.
